column1: Little Goat Diner////Fat Elvis Waffle:  Shared by the table (Myself
column2: mom and the BF)   I love waffles
column5: i like bacon.. you'd think this would be great
column6: right?  Eh.. it was waaaaaay too sweet!!  I suggest you order the syrup on the side because the waffle was drowned in syrup and i could only nibble off the ends.  Too much!
